2. The load Module¶

kea.load.gunzip(source_filepath, dest_filepath, block_size=65536)¶

Unpacks a zipped file.

Parameters

  • source_filepath (string) – The path to the file to unpack

  • dest_filepath (string) – The filename to unpack to

  • block_size (int) – The size of data to keep in memory at once

kea.load.loadAllRates(data_folder)¶
Loads the SNe & compact merger rates for all

available metallicities in BPASS

Parameters

data_folder (string) – Folder containing the BPASS & GW models

Returns

A dictionary in a dictionary containing BPASS histograms. All BPASS metalicities are used and all BPASS & GW event types or used.

The event rate are in #events/yr/\(M_\odot\).

Return type

dict[“metallicity”][“event type”]

kea.load.loadBPASS(file, types)¶

load BPASS rates.

Parameters

  • file (string) – A string pointing to a file to be loaded

  • types (array of strings) – An array of types of events to load from the BPASS file

Returns

A dictionary with BPASS histograms of the supernovae event rates from the file with an entry of each give type in types. The event rates are in #events/yr/\(M_\odot\).

Return type

dict of BPASS histograms

kea.load.loadGW(file, types)¶

Load the given types from the Graviational wave events file

Parameters

  • file (string) – The path to a gravitational wave file from BPASS

  • types (array of strings) – the type of events to extract from the file

Returns

A dictionary with BPASS histograms of the gravitational wave event rates from the file with an entry of each give type in types. The event rates are in #events/yr/\(M_\odot\).

Return type

dict of BPASS histograms

kea.load.packnload(file)¶

Load the data from a BPASS zipped file.

Parameters

file (string) – A string pointing to a zipped version of BPASS data.

Returns

A pandas DataFrame containing the model data from the BPASS file, which is a hoki output.

Return type

pandas DataFrame
